name: Marble Maze-Bowen Gong
description:
Hi! this is a Marble Maze Game, the 2nd Exercise of CS-UY 3113 Intro to Game Design. 

The game is consists of 3 Levels, from easy to difficult. The ball can be controlled by WASD or arrows. A score counter is included in the game, and you should collect 3 collectibles (small yellow squares) to enter the next level. The gate to the next level is represented by the blue spot. 

Please enjoy!!!

Bowen Gong
